DOC.brief_summary: Hemodynamically unstable ventilated PICU & PCICU patients, which a decision for commencement in inotropic therapy or fluid bolus has been made, will be recruited. Hemodynamic measurements will be carried out before and after therapy have been made, including customary hemodynamic parameters, echocardiography and USCOM studies. All parameters will be analyzed for fluid responsiveness or inotropic therapy prediction. Trend in USCOM parameters will be compared to echocardiography CO parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Uninvasive Cardiac Output Monitoring (USCOM) in Critically Ill Children: Validation and Prediction of Hemodynamic Instability
DOC.criteria: Pediatric critically ill ventilated patients admitted to PICU & PCICU Hemodynamically unstable which a decision for commencement in inotropic therapy or fluid bolus has been made parental concent Cardiac shunt Aortal anomaly \ Repair Tracheostomy Parental refusal to participate
